alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:20AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southeastern Dyer, northeastern Lauderdale and northern Haywood Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 919 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Ripley, Newbern, Alamo, Bells, Halls, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Chestnut Bluff, Unionville, Henning, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Edith, Fowlkes, Bonicord, Rohoboth, Maury Junction and Edgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
